reviewText:
Although I can't say for certain, it would seem that this documentary gets much of it's material from John Keegan's "A History of Warfare", which is a pretty good place to start.
Read the book while you're waiting for the re-release, a release on DVD, or a re-run on TLC.
This exploration of war from beginning to our current time is extremly well orgainized, and presented.  From ancient wars to the Persian Gulf, It's all covered.
